Package org.attoparser.dom

Class DOMWriter

  • Object
    • org.attoparser.dom.DOMWriter

  • public final class DOMWriter
extends Object

    Static utility class able to write a DOM tree (or a fragment of it) as markup.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Fernández
